item.title: 芝加哥官员批准 2025 年预算，不增加财产税
item.description: 芝加哥市议会批准了 2025 年约 170 亿美元的预算，在市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）取消物业税上调提议后，该预算增加了约 2.56 亿美元的税费。【原文：The Chicago City Council approved an approximately $17 billion budget for 2025 that raises levies and fees by about $256 million after Mayor Brandon Johnson removed his proposed property tax hike.】

item.title: 关键利率决定前亚洲股市将下滑：市场综述
item.description: 在包括美联储在内的全球主要央行将于本周晚些时候做出利率决定之前，亚洲股市周二有望低开。【原文：Equities in Asia were poised to open Tuesday lower ahead of interest-rate decisions by major central banks across the globe due later this week, including the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 巴西钢铁行业被国家排放目标 "石化
item.description: 巴西钢铁工业集团 Aco Brasil 的负责人表示，巴西在阿塞拜疆举行的 COP29 会议上宣布的雄心勃勃的减排目标 "吓坏 "了南美国家的钢铁企业，它们拒绝采纳无法实现的目标。【原文：Brazil’s ambitious emissions-reduction targets announced at COP29 in Azerbaijan “petrified” the South American nation’s steel companies, which refuse to adopt unachievable goals, according to the head of industry group Aco Brasil.】

item.title: 当年吸引贝森特加盟美国财政部的债务风险如今已迫在眉睫
item.description:
特朗普选择的美国政府金融主管曾是导致英镑崩溃的索罗斯团队的一员。他的新现实比任何汇率赌注都要复杂。【原文：

Trump’s choice to run US government finance was part of the Soros team that crashed the pound. His new reality is more complex than any exchange-rate wager.

】

item.title: 美国禁令前，TikTok 首席执行官周在马阿拉歌与特朗普会面
item.description: 本周一，TikTok 首席执行官周受资（Shou Chew）在 Mar-a-Lago 与当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会面，而此时距离这款热门视频应用因国家安全问题预计将在美国被禁还有数周时间。【原文：TikTok CEO Shou Chew met with president-elect Donald Trump at Mar-a-Lago on Monday just weeks before the popular video app is expected to be banned in the US over national security concerns.】

item.title: 高科技炉灶，也是家用电池
item.description: 美国的一场小型文化战争与电炉有关。在一些人看来，电炉更节能，对空气质量也更好。在另一些人看来，对电炉的要求代表了政府的越权行为，使人们失去了使用燃气灶的自由。Impulse Labs 希望改变整个话题。该公司生产的电磁炉— 与大多数电炉— 非常不同。【原文：One of the minor culture wars in America has to do with electric stoves. To some, they're more energy efficient and better for air quality. To others, electric stove requirements represent government overreach, and a loss of freedom to use a gas range. Impulse Labs wants to change the whole conversation. The company produces an induction stove — very different than most electric stoves — that it claims can not only produce superior food, but can also be a catalyst for electrification, thanks to】

item.title: 财政部长辞职，加拿大赤字加剧
item.description: 总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）的政府出现了比预计更严重的财政赤字，并打破了其财政部长提出的财政目标。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government ran a deeper deficit than projected and broke a fiscal objective outlined by his finance chief, who departed the day she was set to unveil new spending and revenue estimates.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行的多迪格倾向于小型财富收购而非大型交易
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）在经历了多年的回报滞后和最近对美国办公楼贷款的担忧之后，在投资者心目中已经出现了转机。首席执行官维克多-多迪格（Victor Dodig）表示，他不会因为收购而降低股东价值，从而使这一目标面临风险。【原文：After years of lagging returns and more recent concerns over US office loans, Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce has turned a corner with investors. Chief Executive Officer Victor Dodig says he won’t put that at risk with acquisitions that reduce shareholder value.】

item.title: 澳大利亚私人信贷调查面临来自交易和收费的障碍
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监督机构对私人信贷市场的调查面临着各种挑战，其中包括缺乏二级贷款市场和非标准化收费，这凸显了这一日益增长的市场尤其给散户投资者带来的风险。【原文：An Australian corporate watchdog’s probe into the private credit market faces challenges including the absence of a secondary loan market and non-standardized fees, underscoring the risks particularly for retail investors in the growing market.】

item.title: 政府陷入混乱，特鲁多将任命勒布朗为加拿大财政部长
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）将任命多米尼克-勒布朗（Dominic LeBlanc）为加拿大财政部长，接替周一上午以一封措辞严厉的辞职信震惊政府的克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau will name Dominic LeBlanc as Canada’s finance minister to replace Chrystia Freeland, who shocked the government with a scathing resignation letter on Monday morning.】

item.title: 马克莱姆称特朗普关税给前景蒙上阴影，敦促七国集团合作
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）表示，唐纳德-特朗普的贸易威胁正在使世界变得更加不确定，并敦促先进国家共同努力加强经济安全。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem said Donald Trump’s trade threats are making the world a more uncertain place, and urged advanced countries to work together to bolster economic security.】

item.title: TikTok 要求美国最高法院阻止政府禁令
item.description: TikTok 及其中国母公司请求美国最高法院阻止将于下月生效的政府禁令，为该社交媒体平台在拥有超过 1.7 亿用户的市场上继续运营做出了最后的努力。【原文：TikTok and its Chinese parent company asked the US Supreme Court to block a government ban set to take effect next month, making a late push to keep the social-media platform operating in a market with more than 170 million users.】

item.title: 芝加哥因奥运贷款延期支付而不再上调房产税
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）正在改变其提高房产税的计划，提出使用部分债券再融资节省的资金并推迟偿还贷款，以弥补预算赤字。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is reversing his plan to raise property taxes by offering to use some bond refinancing savings and defer a loan repayment to close the budget deficit.】

item.title: 阿根廷一旦取消货币管制将考虑管理汇率
item.description: 据决策者称，阿根廷正在权衡，一旦在2025年取消目前的外汇管制，是否要引入有管理的汇率制度— 即 "肮脏的浮动"—。【原文：Argentina is weighing whether to introduce a managed exchange rate regime — a “dirty float” — once it lifts its current foreign exchange controls in 2025, according to policymakers.】

item.title: 阿根廷摆脱衰退，米莱希望在中期选举前实现增长
item.description: 阿根廷在第三季度摆脱了严重的经济衰退，这增加了哈维尔-米莱总统在明年中期选举中获得胜利的可能性，因为阿根廷的经济增长正在反弹，同时通货膨胀也在降温。【原文：Argentina emerged from a brutal recession in the third quarter, boosting the odds that President Javier Milei heads into next year’s mid-term elections with growth on the rebound alongside cooling inflation.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州参议员特德-克鲁兹力争通过人工智能复仇色情禁令
item.description: 距离国会会议结束还有一周时间，得克萨斯州参议员特德-克鲁兹（Ted Cruz）正在推动一项两党法案，该法案将打击人工智能生成的报复性色情内容。【原文：With one week left before the congressional session ends, Texas Senator Ted Cruz is pushing a bipartisan bill that would crack down on AI-generated revenge pornography.】

item.title: CD Projekt 如何转型制作奇幻角色扮演游戏《巫师 4
item.description:
上周公布的这款备受期待的游戏的领导层表示，公司在过去几年中发生了翻天覆地的变化。【原文：

Leadership on the highly anticipated game, announced last week, says the company has changed drastically over the last few years.

】

item.title: Arm-Qualcomm 合约之争有可能颠覆芯片产业
item.description: Arm Holdings Plc 与高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Arm Holdings Plc’s legal dispute with Qualcomm Inc. is being argued before a federal jury in Delaware this week, pitting two of the world’s most influential chipmakers against each other in an intellectual property case that threatens to roil the technology industry.】

item.title: OpenAI 向所有用户推出 ChatGPT 搜索功能
item.description: OpenAI 将从下周一开始向其聊天机器人 ChatGPT 的所有用户推出搜索产品，从而使其与 Alphabet 公司旗下谷歌的竞争升级。【原文：OpenAI is rolling out a search product to all users of its chatbot ChatGPT beginning on Monday, escalating its rivalry with Alphabet Inc.’s Google.】

item.title: 特朗普 "中间人 "言论令 CVS、UnitedHealth 和 Cigna 股价下挫
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示计划 "打掉 "药品行业中间商之后，药房福利管理公司的股价周一下跌，这表明在他执政期间，该行业不太可能从政治审查中解脱出来。【原文：Shares of pharmacy benefit managers fell Monday after President-elect Donald Trump said he plans to “knock out” drug-industry middlemen, a sign the sector isn’t likely to see relief from political scrutiny during his administration.】

item.title: 特朗普对首席执行官们说："每个人都想成为我的朋友
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）说，他正受到企业高管的拥戴— 这与他八年前首次赢得白宫时的情况截然相反— 因为科技高管和创始人纷纷涌向佛罗里达州，与这位当选总统会面。【原文：Donald Trump said he’s being embraced by business executives — in a stark reversal from when he first won the White House eight years ago — as tech executives and founders flock to Florida to meet with the president-elect.】

item.title: 政治不确定性影响法国经济增长前景
item.description: 就在埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统任命该国一年内第四任总理的几天后，法国央行下调了国内经济增长前景，理由是政治动荡拖累了家庭和企业信心。【原文：The Bank of France cut its domestic growth outlook just days after President Emmanuel Macron named the country’s fourth prime minister in a year, with the central bank citing the political upheaval as a drag on household and business confidence.】

item.title: 高盛集团从 BC Partners 手中收购价值 20 亿欧元的制药商 Synthon
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s alternative investment arm has agreed to buy a majority stake in Dutch generic drugmaker Synthon from BC Partners.】

item.title: 欧盟今年最后一次碳拍卖是 2020 年以来最便宜的一次
item.description: 周一，欧盟 2024 年碳配额的最终拍卖价格为每公吨 63.64 欧元，这是自 2020 年以来最便宜的一次年终拍卖，当时的价格还不到现在的一半。【原文：The final 2024 offering of European Union carbon allowances cleared Monday at €63.64 a metric ton, the cheapest year-end auction since 2020 when the permits were less than half of today’s price.】

item.title: 特朗普发出停止 TikTok 禁播的开放信号，立场有所缓和
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将考虑是否阻止即将对 TikTok 公司实施的禁令，从而扭转他在 2020 年担任总统时对这家中国视频分享应用采取的强硬立场。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump said he would take a look at whether to stave off a looming ban of TikTok Inc., reversing the hard-line stance he took against the Chinese-owned video sharing app when he was president in 2020.】

item.title: 瑞士钢铁援助渐行渐近，偏离放手政策
item.description: 瑞士国会下令瑞士政府提供援助，帮助该国濒临倒闭的钢铁行业，这打破了瑞士政府对企业不闻不问的传统做法。【原文：Switzerland’s government has been ordered by parliament to step in with aid to help the country’s ailing steel industry, in a break with its traditional hands-off approach to business.】

item.title: 参议院报告称亚马逊忽视了自己的工人安全研究
item.description: 据美国国会一个委员会的报告称，亚马逊公司领导人拒绝了公司内部提出的放宽仓库工人生产率以遏制工伤事故的建议。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. leaders rejected internal recommendations that the company relax warehouse worker productivity rates to curb injuries, according to a report from a congressional committee.】

item.title: 谁是收购英国皇家邮政的捷克交易商丹尼尔-克里廷斯基？
item.description: Daniel Kretinsky 花了十多年时间在欧洲建立了一个企业网络，从发电站到零售连锁店和媒体机构，最近的重点是金融不良资产。【原文：Daniel Kretinsky has spent more than a decade building a network of businesses across Europe, from power stations to retail chains and media outlets, with a recent focus on financially distressed assets.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔称欧洲央行可继续降息但不能太快
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，随着人们对通胀放缓至2%目标的信心增强，欧洲中央银行可以继续降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank can continue lowering borrowing costs as confidence in inflation moderating to the 2% target rises, Executive Board Member Isabel Schnabel said.】

item.title: 也许雷-达里奥真的创造了麦乐鸡
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】
